settings.html:
<style>
    .banner-image{
    -webkit-transition: opacity .5s ease;
    -o-transition: opacity .5s ease;
    transition: opacity .5s ease;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding-top: 120px !important;
    padding-bottom: 120px !important;
    background:url("https://wplms.io/demos/demo11/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/ins.jpg");
background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position-y: center;
}
#button2935{font-size:20px !important;width:220px;padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;border-radius:40px;    color: #fff;
    border-color: #fff;} #button2935:hover{}#button2935:hover{}
.vibe_grid .block_media > a {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 120px;
    max-height: 200px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-bottom: 4px solid #f15b2a;
    border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
}

.block_media:hover .overlay, .block_media:hover .hover-link.hyperlink{display:none;}
.event-image{
    margin-top: 30px !important;
    margin-bottom: 30px !important;
    padding-top: 10px !important;
    padding-bottom: 50px !important;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
background:url("https://wplms.io/demos/demo11/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/univ.jpeg");
}
#member_grid421 .member_grid {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(6,1fr);
    grid-gap: 0px;
}

.member_grid {
    display: grid;
}
.member_grid>li:first-child {
    grid-column: 1/3;
    grid-row: 1/3;
}
.member_block {
    position: relative;
}
.member_info {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
}
.member_block h3, .member_block3 h3 {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 0;
}
ul.vibe_filterable {
    position: absolute;
    top: 5px;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.vibe_filterable li {
    float: left;
    margin: 5px 10px 5px 0;
}
ul.vibe_filterable a:hover, ul.vibe_filterable .active a {
    color: #f15b2a;
    background: none;
}
ul.vibe_filterable .active a:before {
    content: '- ';
}
ul.vibe_filterable a {
    padding: 0;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 16px;
    text-transform: none;
}

ul.vibe_filterable a {
    padding: 0;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 16px;
    text-transform: none;
}
</style>
